PayReceRequired.title: Broker Notification Fee Payment Confirmation
PayReceRequired.description:
To proceed with clearance using your nominated 3rd Party Broker, please pay the Broker Notification Fee to the account below and upload the proof of payment.

To pay the Fee, you can transfer KHR 67,650.00 to the Bank Account with the following details:
- Account Name: DHL EXPRESS CAMBODIA LTD
- Account Number: 005186412
